trans-unit.source: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

trans-unit.source: Reliquary Tower
trans-unit.target: Reliquary Tower

trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.
trans-unit.target: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

trans-unit.source: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

trans-unit.source: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

trans-unit.source: Devil-blades and dripping blood make music Rakdos never tires of hearing.

trans-unit.target: Dimir Charm

trans-unit.source: Choose one — • Counter target sorcery spell. • Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. • Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Experiment One
trans-unit.target: Experiment One

trans-unit.source: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

trans-unit.source: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

trans-unit.source: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."
